>
[Incredible Companion (Druid)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4737) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Rivethun Involutionist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=310) (Level 8)

**Prerequisites**
[Mature Animal Companion (Druid)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4725)

</column>

---

Your animal companion continues to grow and develop. It becomes either a nimble or savage animal companion (page 211), gaining additional capabilities determined by the type.

<title level="2">Incredible Companion (Druid) leads to...</title>
[Primal Howl](/Feats.aspx?ID=4745), [Specialized Companion (Druid)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4756), [Specialized Spirit Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=7592)
name: Incredible Companion (Druid)
